mapper.select: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, password, provider, provider_id, road_address, detail_address, created_at, updated_at FROM member_tbl WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, password, provider, provider_id, road_address, detail_address, created_at, updated_at FROM member_tbl WHERE email = #{email} AND provider = #{provider}
